title: Jesus is both MORE Generous and MORE Demanding than we think Reasonable
description:
Goodness is split in our moral imaginary between kindness and strength. In the midst of the Judean culture war Jesus ways in to confound the polarizing factions with an application of the Mosaic law that irritates all sides. We will look at the parable of the Good Samaritan within its broader context.
